title: New report reveals Prince Harry ‘did not want to be in the same room’ as Queen Camilla when he spoke to the King about cancer diagnosis
description: A new report has revealed that Prince Harry “did not want to be in the same room” as Queen Camilla when he spoke to the King about his cancer diagnosis. British journalist and friend of the queen, Petronella Wyatt claimed that the Prince did not want his stepmother in the room when he met with his father King Charles.

title: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry hit the slopes on Valentine's Day after landing in Canada
description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have been pictured on the slopes in Canada as they prepare to launch the first edition of a winter Invictus Games. The Sussexes are seen holding hands and smiling in the picturesque setting of Whistler, British Columbia at an Invictus event called 'One Year to Go'.

title: Meghan Markle praises 'talented' designers who launched new website after criticism
description: Meghan Markle has defended the “talented team” behind her new website following a spate of criticism. The Duchess of Sussex and her husband, Prince Harry, launched their new website earlier this week. Their previous Archewell site now automatically redirects to “Sussex.com”, which consistently refers to the couple by their official royal titles.
